Reviews.Title: Low price, all metal, small size, decent video quality.
Reviews.Author: FuFa
Reviews.Content: For the price, these little cameras are very good.  They are all metal, have a pre-attached nice metal bracket and stay pretty cool compared to other hot running cameras I have owned.For a tiny pinhole lens camera, the video quality is pretty good. They are certainly not high def cameras, but they do good for what they are.  They even work pretty well in semi-low light (but since they are not night vision cameras, there HAS to be some ambient light to see an image. In very low light or no light conditions you will see nothing).The housing is very small, and the camera PCB can be removed from the housing and rotated 90 degrees either way if needed (I had to do this with one of them, to mount it on the side of a window frame).  I also spray painted a couple of them white to blend in with the window frames they were mounted to (just make sure you cover the pinhole lens before spraying. I cut a toothpick in half and stuck the thick end into the hole to protect it from overspray, worked like a charm).Overall I'm very hapy with the little cameras. 5-stars

Reviews.Title: Search for cheaper camera first!
Reviews.Author: N. Angulo "nore"
Reviews.Content: VideoSecu like many other companies are just distributors of Chinese products. You can find this same camera cheaper by googling 1/4" Sony CCD 420 Line Color CCTV Analog Pinhole Surveillance Camera. You should be able to get this camera for 19.99. This is a decent camera but it's NOT worth over 25 dollars.

Reviews.Title: Decent picture...
Reviews.Author: Bob M.
Reviews.Content: I was pleasantly surprised with the picture quality of this mini camera. It has a surprisingly clear picture in my low-light placement.

Reviews.Title: Very compact
Reviews.Author: Bill Schebeck
Reviews.Content: Small size, so so quality image,  Very easy to install.  Insulation where it meets the case was pulled away a half inch, but it works and wont be moved.  Might be issue on a robot.

Reviews.Title: No instructions!!!! No power supply!!!!!
Reviews.Author: JHH
Reviews.Content: disappointed.....nothing in the box besides camera and casine..i dont understand why it cost as much as it did.The LYD CM203CA is under half as much money yet comes with instructions power supply and a wireless 9V battery adapter..would NOT recommend

Reviews.Title: Good value
Reviews.Author: R. Worcester
Reviews.Content: Works great. Be aware than it is "low resolution", hence the inexpensive price. Easy to hide in an existing electrical box. Keep the camera close to the subject you are filming. Distance is fuzzy and not enlargeable.

Reviews.Title: Ok video but not for outdoor!
Reviews.Author: J J
Reviews.Content: This camera does not show in pics but it is vented on the back side and has a quick disconnect connector on the lower back side below the vents that is not weather proof at all.  It is the same type connector thats on computer mother boards.  So if id didn't say outdoor camera on title I would give it higher review

Reviews.Title: No instructions!
Reviews.Author: Mrodri
Reviews.Content: Came without instructions! and the cord is too short, besides that I couldn't try it, so I don't know how it works

Reviews.Title: Great deal for the price
Reviews.Author: Shawn
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera and was impressed(impressed)with the good quality. Camera is small and discrete, and you can place it anywhere you want. Not many of mini cameras works so great in low or bright light environments. Great deal for the price. For the overall performance that is ok with me. Good purchase!

Reviews.Title: Good product for the price. Service was very good.
Reviews.Author: C. A. Rodriguez
Reviews.Content: For the price you can't get a better Pin Hole camera. If you want better resolution you would probably pay more than double the price. Also, though I had problems with the cable that came with the camera. I called the shipper and they send me a replacement cable without any problems. Great service.

Reviews.Title: Not ready out of the box
Reviews.Author: Krizot
Reviews.Content: This does not come with a power supply. It has a BNC connector you will need adapters if you are planning on using it with an AV monitor or DVR that does not accept BNC. Wire leads coming off the camera are short, you will need an extension cable. Nice camera. They do sell it on Amazon with a power supply and extension wire.

Reviews.Title: good video...need cone.
Reviews.Author: Paul E. Withers
Reviews.Content: the cam is good for simple video veiwing.. i would like to know if i can order cone caps to fit this cam.
